attributes.title: FAKE NEWS!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking it was going to be a free “OnlyFans” of thicc, daddy Trump. Unfortunately, I didn’t get any of that. Rather I got advertisements for injectable bleach, easy breathing masks with a hole in the middle, and of course, thicc boi Trump’s biggest flex, his merch. After searching around, the only thing that was free were half naked, “cutie,” noodle boi Mike Pence. I soon realized I wouldn’t find hottie Trumps pictures unless I paid for the $30.00 monthly subscription. Heartbroken, I had no other choice than to delete the app.

attributes.title: This app is a**
attributes.review: Trump doesn’t like the girls and the gays. We don’t like him either. BLACK LIVES MATTER.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: Hi welcome to chili’s !!! People said if I had this app it would make me famous ✨ but my crush Told me I smelled like beef 🥩 . Then my phone went off and i could’ve dropped my croissant 🥐 ! But look at all these chickens on this app 🐥! Don’t worry I told the time I wasn’t drunk 🥴 I got a notification saying merry Chrysler but it was Wednesday my dudes. I was sitting there barbecue sauce on my -.... 👁 👄 👁 I’m shooketh .. when will you learn your actions have consequences? Is this allowed!? Stop . Mother trucker dude that hurt like a butt check on a stick . To shorten it , it’s an avocado thanks . 🧚‍♀️ ✨✨

attributes.title: THIS APP IS A MAJOR DISAPPOINTMENT!
attributes.review: This app is made EXTREMELY poorly. For one thing, I have submitted my cell phone number in MULTIPLE times and have never received a confirmation code. Additionally, it lags and shuts down CONSTANTLY. I hate this app! It’s not worth it, and it’s clear that Donald Jerkoff Trump has no interest in creating a meaningful app to get to potential voters.

attributes.title: DISGRACE TO MY EYES
attributes.review:
This is the worst app to ever be created! First it asks me for my phone number which I do not feel comfortable to put. So I put 666-666-6969 but it didn't work. This app isn't safe. And the terms and conditions are UNACCEPTABLE. APPLE U BETTER TAKE THIS APP DOWN OR YOUR LOYAL APPLE CUSTOMERS WILL NEVER BE HAPPY WITH WHAT U HAVE DONE. 
NOW I AM BLIND OF WHAT I FIRST SAW, THIS IS NOT OKAY.

✨💫🌟🌈other apps are awesome🥰❤️🥳just not this one😘✨❤️🤪💀😭

attributes.title: WORST APP
attributes.review: i’m usually not one to review apps but this app made me poop uncontrollably for hours. i don’t even know how it happened. as soon as i downloaded it i pooped my pants. don’t download unless you want irritable bowel syndrome 😾😾😾😾😾

I am disappointed in this app. I am NOT a trump supporter anymore and frankly I NEVER WAS. This app had me do all kinds of stuff like make me eat poop, smell a hard sock I found under my brothers bed, and worst of all, DELETE TIKTOK. Man TikTok mah loife 😭. I also realized trump looks like the inside of my vegan black bean burger (orange poop). SO DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. thank you 🙏

Don’t download this app. As soon as it downloaded onto my phone, it said that all the chicken tenders and broccoli from my freezer was gone! And when I went downstairs to check it out, IT WAS GONE! Along with my pet fly and my little sister! The stupid app said that it’s gonna steal all my money. So I had to go tell someone as soon as possible. So I went to weenie hut jr. to get me a McDouble so I could feed my pet microwave, just so I could get a message from the app saying it took my pet microwave as well. Like wth! So I opened up my backpack to tell the map to take me back home. And when I got home I went to check what in the hell else the app took from my home! I thought it would make sense to check my freezer because that’s the original spot the app took my things, JUST TO SEE MY MUFFINS THE FREEZER! LIKE WHO IN THE HELL PUT THE MUFFINS IN THE FREEZER! Lord just so I could get another message from the app saying they were the ones who put the muffins in the freezer. Like ESCUSE ME!? ESCUSE ME!? So I immediately deleted this trash ass app. 0/10 don’t 
recommend.
